attributes.action: Government members who go to Bilderberg Group metting to report to Parliament
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned request that any member of the Government, eg. George Osborne or Ken Clarke, who take part in meeting with bankers, business and members of foreign governments at the Bilderberg Group meeting in Watford this week, must report to the House of Commons on those meeting, it the hope of getting open government and transparency.
